data.name: 0000 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Now starting the Investigation Mode tutorial.

data.name: 0001 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04In Investigation Mode, you will navigate abnormal space with an SOS Brigade member.

data.name: 0002 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04The objective is to cause the abnormal space naturally dissolve...

data.name: 0003 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...before Haruhi Suzumiya arrives.

data.name: 0004 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04In order to do that, you must find the hidden "singularities" on the map...

data.name: 0005 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...and then materialize and erase them.

data.name: 0006 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04On the bottom left of the screen is a number indicating how many singularities remain.

data.name: 0007 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04If you can erase this minimum number of singularities...

data.name: 0008 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...it will be possible to clear the stage.

data.name: 0009 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04In order to clear the Investigation part of the stage, erase all of the singularities.

data.name: 0010 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04You must achieve the goal before "Time Over" occurs.

data.name: 0011 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04The top screen will show the time limit that remains before you lose.

data.name: 0012 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Find and erase the target number of singularities before then,

data.name: 0013 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04or it will result in Game Over.

data.name: 0014 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04In abnormal space, you are able to do the following actions with your Brigade member.

data.name: 0015 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04１. "Movement"

data.name: 0016 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Touch a location and they will move to that place.

data.name: 0017 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04２. "Investigate"

data.name: 0018 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When the search icon on the upper left of the screen is OFF, touch at a member's feet.

data.name: 0019 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When you do, all the tiles surrounding that tile (9 tiles total) will light up.

data.name: 0020 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: You will then be able to "investigate" any of them.

data.name: 0021 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: "Investigate" will allow you to search for nearby hidden singularities.

data.name: 0022 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: However, you will not be able to materialize them with the investigate action.

data.name: 0023 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Once you've guessed the hiding spot of one based on the markers near your feet,

data.name: 0024 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: please materialize the singularity by using the "search point" action.

data.name: 0025 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04３. "Search Point"

data.name: 0026 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When you touch the "Search Icon" at the upper left of the screen...

data.name: 0027 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...an icon indicating "Search Point Mode" will appear over the member's head.

data.name: 0028 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you touch a tile adjacent to the member while in this mode...

data.name: 0029 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...that point will be searched.

data.name: 0030 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When you search a point that contains a hidden singularity...

data.name: 0031 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...it will be forced to materialize.

data.name: 0032 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: You can only use "Search Point" to search one tile at a time.

data.name: 0033 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: It's a basic action that materializes the singularity.

data.name: 0034 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you want to perform the "Investigate" action again, turn off the Search Icon.

data.name: 0035 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Please be careful to not confuse these two modes.

data.name: 0036 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When you investigate, the marks near your feet indicate the odds of a singularity existing.

data.name: 0037 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The "!" mark on a tile indicates that within one space of that tile...

data.name: 0038 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...a singularity exists.

data.name: 0039 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The number of "!" marks will increase according to how many singularities…

data.name: 0040 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …exist in the tiles surrounding it.

data.name: 0041 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Once a singularity has materialized, rub it with your stylus to erase it.

data.name: 0042 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you rub an area slightly wider than it, you can erase it more efficiently.

data.name: 0043 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: As a final reminder, please be mindful of the time limit when finding and erasing singularities.
